first_interaction.speaker: Daniel
first_interaction.text: Magandang araw! Ako si PO7 Daniel. May maitutulong ba ako sa'yo?

first_interaction.speaker: Daniel
first_interaction.text: Kung may napansin kang kakaiba o problema sa paligid, ipaalam mo agad sa amin.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Daniel
repeated_interaction.text: Oh, nandito ka ulit! May bago ka bang balita o concern?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Daniel
repeated_interaction.text: Laging tandaan, ligtas ka dito hanggaâ€™t magtutulungan tayong lahat.
